info.title: SAER301 API Documentation
info.description: Auto-generated API documentation for SAE301 project

get.description: Returns a list of clubs awaiting approval

post.description: Approves a pending club and assigns club-manager role to creator
Rejects a pending club with optional reason
Login and retrieve an API token
Register a new user and retrieve an API token

message.example: The email has already been taken.

get.summary: Get list of races with leaderboards
Get individual leaderboard for a race

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search by user name or email

get.summary: Get team leaderboard for a race
Get specific user result in a race
Get races managed by the authenticated user
get.description: Returns a list of races where the user is an organizer, raid manager, or admin

get.summary: Get participants for a specific race
get.description: Returns a detailed list of participants and their registration status for a race managed by the user

403.description: Forbidden - User does not manage this race

patch.summary: Validate or flag documents for a registration
patch.description: Allows a manager to manually validate registration documents or flag them as invalid

get.description: Returns the currently authenticated user
Returns users matching the search query for team creation
Returns all users with adherent role

put.description: Sets the password for the authenticated user (typically for social login users)

get.description: Redirects the user to the OAuth provider (google, strava)
Handle the callback from the OAuth provider
Returns a paginated list of approved clubs with optional search and filters

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search by club name or city

post.description: Creates a new club (pending approval)

get.summary: Get clubs managed by the user
get.description: Returns a list of clubs where the user is an owner (creator) or manager
Returns club details. Members list is only visible to club members.

delete.description: Deletes a club (admin or club manager only)

post.description: Authenticated user requests to join a club

400.description: Already a member or request pending

post.description: Club manager approves a pending join request
Club manager rejects a pending join request

delete.description: Club manager removes a member from the club

post.description: Authenticated user leaves a club they are a member of
Club manager promotes a member to manager role
Club manager demotes another manager to regular member

get.description: Returns user profile data or renders profile edit view

post.description: Completes the user profile with required information (DOB, Address, Phone, License/Medical)

get.description: Download PDF with all validated race registrations

post.description: Scan QR code and mark team registration as present
Toggle participant presence status

get.description: Retrieves all team members with their registration status for a given registration
Checks if the authenticated user is eligible to register for a specific race

post.description: Registers the authenticated user for a specific race

400.description: Bad Request - Validation failed or credentials missing

message.example: Valid licence or PPS code required

get.description: Returns all raids with related data for client-side filtering

post.description: Creates a new raid event. Only responsable-club can create raids.

gestionnaire_raid_id.description: User ID to assign as gestionnaire-raid

get.description: Returns a single raid
Display the QR code scanner page for check-in

post.description: Check-in a team via QR code scan

get.description: Generate start-list PDF for the raid
Display the team age validation interface with rules and thresholds
Returns the current age thresholds (A, B, C) for team validation

rules.example: Age requirements: All participants must be at least 12 years old...

post.description: Validates a team's age composition against the rules: all >= A, and if any < B then at least one >= C
Validates a team's composition by calculating ages from birthdates

reference_date.description: Date to calculate ages from (defaults to today)

post.description: Checks if a single participant meets the minimum age requirement

get.description: Display the team creation page

post.description: Create a new team with optional teammates and email invitations

302.description: Team created successfully, redirect to dashboard

get.description: Display detailed information about a specific team

put.description: Update team information including name, image, and members

delete.description: Delete a team if it has no active registrations

422.description: Cannot delete team with active registrations

post.description: Send an invitation to join the team via email

403.description: Unauthorized - Only team leader can invite

get.description: Display the registration ticket with QR code for race check-in

200.description: Registration ticket page with QR code

get.description: Display the page to accept a team invitation via token

302.description: Redirect to login if not authenticated

post.description: Accept a team invitation and join the team

302.description: Invitation accepted, redirect to team page

get.description:
Download QR code image with permission verification

Only team members and leaders can download QR codes
Returns paginated list of teams based on user role

200.description: Team management page with teams list

post.description: Remove a specific member from the team

get.description: Returns list of all runners for a specific race registration with PPS information

200.description: List of runners with PPS status

post.description: Add a new runner to a race registration with optional PPS information

put.description: Update PPS number, expiry date, or status for a race participant

delete.description: Remove a participant from a race registration

post.description: Verify or reject a runner's PPS documentation (admin/race manager only)

403.description: Unauthorized - Admin or race manager only

LeaderboardTeam.title: LeaderboardTeam
LeaderboardTeam.description: Team leaderboard result with average scores and points

age_category_id.description: Age category ID for competitive races

MedicalDoc.title: Medical Document
MedicalDoc.description: Medical document or PPS for a user

PriceAgeCategory.title: PriceAgeCategory
PriceAgeCategory.description: Price and age category for races

RegistrationPeriod.title: Registration Period
RegistrationPeriod.description: Registration period for a raid event

password_is_set.description: True if the user has a local password set

connected_accounts.description: List of connected social accounts (if loaded)

apiAuth.description: Login with email and password to get the authentication token
apiAuth.name: Token based Based

tags.name: Admin - Club Approval
tags.description: Admin endpoints for club approval management

tags.name: Race Registration
tags.description: Endpoints for race registration and eligibility checks

tags.name: Team Age Validation
tags.description: Endpoints for validating team age composition and participant eligibility

tags.name: Teams
tags.description: Team creation, management, and invitation endpoints

tags.name: Team Management
tags.description: Endpoints for team management (admin and team leaders)
